response.overview: A civilian oil rig crew is recruited to conduct a search and rescue effort when a nuclear submarine mysteriously sinks. One diver soon finds himself on a spectacular odyssey 25,000 feet below the ocean's surface where he confronts a mysterious force that has the power to change the world or destroy it.
response.tagline: When you get there, you will understand.
response.title: The Abyss

results.name: James Cameron introduces The Abyss | Film4 Interview
The Abyss Wins Visual Effects: 1990 Oscars
